Name: Detective Rosie Morgan: Murder on the River Thames
About the game: “Detective Rosie Morgan: Murder on the River Thames” is a Detective Mystery Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim set in London. You play as DI (Detective Inspector) Rosie Morgan, one of the best and brightest detectives in London's Metropolitan Police. See if you can help Rosie manage solving a case that has all of Britain holding its breath, while still maintaining a healthy love life in this gripping tale of passion, murder, and romance. Featuring: - A gripping murder mystery plotline - Hilarious dating sim mechanics - Go on very memorable dates - Modern fusion jazz and chill soundtrack - Beautiful anime character art - Multiple endings - Over 60,000 word count
